title: My phone keeps rebooting and keeps discharging at a rapid pace, it drops from 100% to 0 in minutes
content: I have done a factory reset a couple of times, left the phone alone for more than a week so that it discharges completely, let the phone charge to a 100% and did not install an app to check if it is able to retain its power for longer time, but it discharges and powers done in minutes
